00046 void HelpUser( void ) {
00047   writeln( "Usage: amateur SNAPSHOTID{1..?} [xamshzt]");
00048   writeln( "where SNAPSHOT is an integer between 1 and 14");
00049   writeln( "-a runs AMIGA's subhalo finder AHFstep");
00050   writeln( "-m runs AMIGA's subhalo <=> halo identifier MergerTree");
00051   writeln( "-o extracts relevant results from AHF output");
00052   writeln( "-s matches subhalos to their host halo");
00053   writeln( "-h runs AMIGA's HaloTracker (experimental)");
00054   writeln( "-t computes the tidal field of the given snapshot at 10 smoothing scales");
00055   writeln( "-x extracts information to a HDF5 file");
00056   writeln( "-z analyses the snapshot file, using AMIGA's subhalos" );
00057   writeln( "-T test runs for debugging purposes" );
00058   writeln( "default: runs successively x, a, o, m, s, (h), z, t" );
00059   for(int i=0; i<18; ++i)
00060     std::cout << "  " << i+1 << " " << Snaps(i) << std::endl;
00061   std::cout << std::endl;
00062   //printMinMaxValues();
00063 }
00064 
00075 int main ( int argc, char *argv[ ] ) {
00076 
00077   // renice with "int setpriority(int which, 
00078   //                              id_t who (0 = this process),
00079   //                              int nice);"
00080   setpriority(PRIO_PROCESS, 0, 15);
00081   writeln("");
00082   writeln( "AMATEUR by Pascal Steger,    psteger@phys.ethz.ch");
00083   writeln( "=================================================");
00084   writeln( "");
00085   if ( argc <= 1 || argc > 3 ) {
00086     HelpUser();
00087     return 0;
00088   }
00089   //  Array3 A(512,512,512);
00090   ScalarField S(512,512,512,0.3,3);
00091   int isnap = atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) - 1;
00092   std::cout << "    Looking at snapshot " << Snaps( isnap ) << "." << std::endl;
00093 
00094   for ( int i = 0; i < 1; ++i ) {
00095     // std::cout << "commandline argument nr. " << i << std::endl;
00096     char c = getopt( argc, argv, "aomshtTxz" );
00097     switch ( c ) {
00098     case 'a':
00099       writeln(" Running AMIGA's AHFstep on snapshot file...");
00100       AHFrun( isnap );
00101       break;
00102     
00103     case 'o':
00104       writeln(" Extracting interesting output columns from AHF output...");
00105       AOutput( isnap );
00106       break;
00107 
00108     case 'm':
00109       writeln(" Searching halo/subhalo-relations with OwnMergerTree...");
00110       MergerTreeRun( isnap );
00111       break;
00112 
00113     case 's':
00114       writeln(" Matching subhalos to their host..." );
00115       SubhaloMatch( isnap );
00116       break;
00117 
00118     case 'h':
00119       writeln(" Running HaloTracker...");
00120       //HaloTrackerRun( isnap );
00121       break;
00122 
00123     case 't':
00124       writeln( " Computing tidal field..." );
00125       TidalField( isnap, 512, 500.0 );
00126       break;
00127 
00128     case 'x':
00129       writeln( " Extracting GADGET2 binary to HDF5..." );
00130       ExtractSnap( isnap );
00131       break;
00132 
00133     case 'z':
00134       writeln( " Analyzing snapshot file with AHF Halos..." );
00135       AnalyzeSnap( isnap );
00136       break;
00137 
00138     case 'T':
00139       writeln( " Running test routines..." );
00140 
00141       for(int i=0; i<512; ++i){
00142     S.setValue(i,i,i,0.1f);
00143     //A.setValue(i,i,i,0.3*i);
00144     //std::cout << A(i,0,0)<< std::endl;
00145     //  S.setValue(i,i,i,-1.0f);
00146       }
00147       S.test();
00148       break;
00149 
00150     default:
00151       writeln( " Default: Extracting GADGET2 binary to HDF5..." );
00152       ExtractSnap( isnap );
00153       writeln( " Running AMIGA's AHFstep on snapshot file..." );
00154       AHFrun( isnap );
00155       writeln( " Extracting interesting output columns from AHF output...");
00156       AOutput( isnap );
00157       writeln( " Searching halo/subhalo-relations with OwnMergerTree..." );
00158       MergerTreeRun( isnap );
00159       writeln( " Matching subhalos to their host..." );
00160       SubhaloMatch( isnap );
00161       writeln( " Running HaloTracker...");
00162       // HaloTrackerRun(isnap);
00163       writeln( " Analyzing snapshot file with Halo..." );
00164       AnalyzeSnap( isnap );
00165       writeln( " Computing tidal field..." );
00166       TidalField( isnap, 512, 500.0 );
00167     }
00168   }
00169   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00170 }
